select * from warn_record where 1=1
and startTimeYMD BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select *,count(*) warnCount from (select wt.name wtName,startTimeYMD,CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'-',day(startTimeYMD)) xAxisDataLabel from warn_record wr,warn_trigger wt where wr.warnType=wt.warnType and startTimeYMD BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate})t GROUP BY t.xAxisDataLabel ORDER BY startTimeYMD

select *,count(*) warnCount from (select wt.name wtName,startTimeYMD, case when day(startTimeYMD) between 1 and 7 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.1-',month(startTimeYMD),'.7') when day(startTimeYMD) between 8 and 14 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.8-',month(startTimeYMD),'.14') when day(startTimeYMD) between 15 and 21 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.15-',month(startTimeYMD),'.21') else case when month(startTimeYMD)=1||month(startTimeYMD)=3||month(startTimeYMD)=5||month(startTimeYMD)=7||month(startTimeYMD)=8||month(startTimeYMD)=10||month(startTimeYMD)=12 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.22-',month(startTimeYMD),'.31') when month(startTimeYMD)=4||month(startTimeYMD)=6||month(startTimeYMD)=9||month(startTimeYMD)=11 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.22-',month(startTimeYMD),'.30') else case when year(startTimeYMD)%4=0 then CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.22-',month(startTimeYMD),'.29') else CONCAT(month(startTimeYMD),'.22-',month(startTimeYMD),'.28') end end end xAxisDataLabel from warn_record wr,warn_trigger wt where wr.warnType=wt.warnType and startTimeYMD BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate})t GROUP BY t.wtName,t.xAxisDataLabel ORDER BY startTimeYMD

select *,count(*) warnCount from (select wt.name wtName,startTimeYMD,month(startTimeYMD) xAxisDataLabel from warn_record wr,warn_trigger wt where wr.warnType=wt.warnType and startTimeYMD BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate})t GROUP BY t.wtName,t.xAxisDataLabel ORDER BY startTimeYMD

select wr.areaId,CONCAT('区域',wr.areaId) areaName,wt.`name` wtName from warn_record wr,warn_trigger wt where wr.warnType=wt.warnType and wr.areaId is not null and startTimeYMD BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}
